roleset.name: determine the ordering of consituents in a specific individual, to compare against standard sequence
roleset.note: RESEQUENCE-V, RESEQUENCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

role.descr: genome, or the entire group of constituents in a sequence
specific genes (or constituents) looked at within arg1

example.name: resequence-v
example.text: We resequenced the genome of Clostridium difficile 630Δerm (DSM 28645), a model strain commonly used for the generation of insertion mutants.
example.arg: the genome of Clostridium difficile 630Δerm (DSM 28645), a model strain commonly used for the generation of insertion mutants.

example.name: resequence-v
example.text: New high - throughput sequencing technologies are dramatically lowering the cost of DNA sequencing , with many researchers hoping to bring the cost of *PRO* resequencing a human genome down to a thousand dollars .
